summary.event: Special Issue on Conceptual and Technical Engineering of Blockchain-based Information Systems
summary.description: This special issue aims to advance the state of Blockchain-based Information Systems (BISs) and their engineering by addressing conceptual and technical challenges at different levels. It invites theoretical, conceptual, technical, and practical contributions on various topics related to Blockchain-based Information Systems (BISs).

submission_details.submission_guidelines: Authors should prepare their manuscripts according to the 'Guide for Authors' of the Information Systems journal outlined at the journal website.

topics: Models, methods, and tools for the design of BISs
Challenges related to the design of BISs
Empirical material providing and assessing approaches to the design of BISs
Field experience providing details, benefits, or challenges in the design of BISs
Innovation and re-engineering using Blockchain Technology
Blockchain-enabled business processes for specific industries
Blockchain data management including sharing and provenance
Data privacy and confidentiality on the blockchain
Cross-chain, interoperable and bridge solutions for BISs
Analysis techniques of blockchain data and BISs
Data auditing and monitoring on blockchain
